From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 American filmBardejovDirected byDanny A. AbeckaserWritten byShmuel LynnProduced byEmil A. FishStarringRobert DaviDanny A. AbeckaserCinematographyBarry MarkowitzMusic byLionel CohenDistributed byGravitas VenturesRelease date
March 19, 2024 (2024-03-19)
CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Bardejov is a 2024 American historical war film written by Shmuel Lynn, directed by Danny A. Abeckaser and starring Robert Davi and Abeckaser.


Cast[edit]
Danny A. Abeckaser as Dr. Atlas
Robert Davi as Lowey
Kyle Stefanski
Dean Miroshnikov
Darren Weiss as Fredrik
Omer Hazan as Hershel
Release[edit]
In December 2023, it was announced that the North American distribution rights to the film were acquired by Gravitas Ventures.[1]  The film was released on VOD on March 19, 2024.[2]

Reception[edit]
Terry Sherwood of Film Threat rated the film an 8 out of 10.[3]

References[edit]


^ Yossman, K.J. (December 18, 2023). "Danny A. Abeckaser Sets Holocaust Feature 'Bardejov,' Gravitas Ventures Acquires North American Rights (EXCLUSIVE)". Variety. Retrieved March 11, 2024.

^ Devore, Britta (February 1, 2024). "'Bardejov' Trailer: A Town Fights Back in Daring WWII Drama [Exclusive]". Collider. Retrieved March 11, 2024.

^ Sherwood, Terry (March 5, 2024). "Bardejov". Film Threat. Retrieved March 11, 2024.
